name: Terraformer
description: Have a terraform rating of 35 (or 26 with Turmoil.)

name: Mayor
description: Own 3 city tiles

name: Gardener
description: Own 3 greenery tiles

name: Builder
description: Have 8 building tags

name: Planner
description: Have 16 cards in your hand

name: Generalist
description: Have increased all 6 productions by 1 step

name: Specialist
description: Have 10 in production of any resource

name: Ecologist
description: Have 4 bio tags (plant, microbe and animal tags count as bio tags)

name: Tycoon
description: Have 15 project cards (blue and green cards)

name: Legend
description: Have played 5 events

name: Diversifier
description: Have 8 different tags

name: Tactician
description: Have 5 cards with requirements

name: Polar Explorer
description: Own 3 tiles on the two bottom rows

name: Energizer
description: Have 6 energy production

name: Rim Settler
description: Have 3 Jovian tags

name: Hoverlord

name: Networker

description: Have 6 moon tags

name: Colonizer
description: Have built 4 colonies

name: Farmer
description: Have 4 plant production

name: Minimalist
description: Have no more than 2 cards in hand

name: Terran
description: Have 6 Earth tags

name: Tropicalist

description: Have built 3 colonies

name: Firestarter

name: Banker

name: Miner

name: Celebrity

name: Industrialist
description: Having most steel and energy resources (after final production round)

name: Desert Settler

description: Most tiles adjacent to ocean tiles

name: Benefactor

name: Cultivator
description: Most greenery tiles

name: Full Moon

name: Lunar Magnate

name: Curator

name: Engineer

description: Most empty spaces adjacent to your tiles

name: Botanist
